name: Kung Fu Panda Secret Ingredient Noodle Soup
description: Secret Ingredient Noodle Soup inspired by Kung Fu Panda's Mr. Ping. This is an easy to make soup that tastes delicious, perfect for a cool evening.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large soup pot, combine the carrot, onion, green onion, celery, garlic and oil and cook until tender. Add the salt and pepper and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add broth, bouillon cube and water and bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add broth, bouillon cube and water and bring...

recipeInstructions.text: Add soy sauce and noodles to the broth and cook for 5 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until noodles are ready.
